text: Grigori Grigoryevich Postanogov (; born 27 June 1995) is a Russian football player. He plays for FC Volna Nizhny Novgorod Oblast. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Russian Football National League for FC Baltika Kaliningrad on 11 July 2015 in a game against FC Shinnik Yaroslavl. ==References== ==External links== * Player page on the FNL website Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Baltika Kaliningrad players Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players
title: Grigori Postanogov
